sentences.en: an aerial socket on the television
Electric bulb and socket, with a pair of prods for testing for element shorts and defects.
sentences.cn: 电灯,插座和一对探针,以供试验电池的短路和检查故障用.

sentences.en: Faber took in the empty light socket with the chair beneath it . He frowned in amazemnt.
sentences.cn: 费伯蹬上椅子看了看那空着的灯泡插座,惊异地蹙起眉头.

sentences.en: He put the electric plug into the socket.
He set a socket in each pedestal.
sentences.cn: 他把每根基座上都按上了灯芯盘.

sentences.en: He took the machine from its bag and plugged it into the wall socket.
sentences.cn: 他把机器从袋子里拿了出来，接到墙上的插座上。

sentences.en: I'm sure that yellow lead matched up to that yellow socket.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定那根黄线接那个黄色插口。

sentences.en: Just put the plug in the socket and switch on the machine.
sentences.cn: 只需将插头插入插座并开动机器就行了.
千万不要使电源插座过载。

sentences.en: Put the plug in the socket.
She pushed the plug into the ( electric ) socket on the wall.
sentences.cn: 她把插头插入墙上的插座里.

sentences.en: She put the electric plug into the socket.
sentences.cn: 她将电插头插到了插座里.

sentences.en: Switch on the light at the wall - socket.
sentences.cn: 把电灯接通在墙上的电源插座上.

sentences.en: The battery charger plugs into any mains socket.
sentences.cn: 这个电池充电器可以插入任何类型的电源插座.

sentences.en: The candle had burned down to the socket of the candlestick.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛一直烧到烛盘底上.

phrases.tran_cn: 插座，插孔；电源插座，塞孔
n. 开关插座；开关灯座
壁式插座；壁灯灯座；墙壁插座；壁插座

trans.tran_cn: 插座，灯座，窝，穴，[解]眼窝，孔窝
trans.tran_en: a place in a wall where you can connect electrical equipment to the supply of electricity
